name: 蔣政諺
objective:
神經網路之簡介、直傳式神經網路、監督式學習、非監督式學習、回傳式神經網路、神經網路之結構分析、學習方式分析神經網路之應用。
Introduction to Networks, Feedback Neutral Networks ,Supervised Learning, Unsupervised Learning, Recurrant Neural Networks, Structure Analysis of Neural Networks, Analysis of Learning Methods, Applications of Neural Networks.
schedule:
Week 1_Syllabus and Overview
Week 2_Introduction to Neural Network
Week 3_Artificial Neural Network Architectures and Training Processes
Week 4_Rosenblatt Perceptron
Week 5_ADALINE Network and Delta Rule
Week 6,7_Multilayer Perceptron Networks
Week 8_Auxiliary Characteristics of MLP
Week 9_Application of MLP
Week 10_Radial Basis Function Networks
Week 11_Recurrent Hopfield Networks
Week 12,13_Self-Organizing Kohonen Networks
Week 13,14_Learning Vector Quantization
Week 15_Counter Propagation Networks
Week 16_Adaptive Resonance Theory Networks
Week 17,18_Convolutional Neural Networks
scorePolicy:
作業與說明 (Assignment and Report): 75%
期末作業 (Final Assignment): 25%
materials:
[1] Artificial Neural Networks - A Practical Course, by Da Silva et al. 2017
[2] Neural Networks and Learning Machines, by Simon Haykin. 2008
[3] Raschka, Sebastian, and Vahid Mirjalili. "Python machine learning: Machine learning and deep learning with Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow 2." Packt Publishing Ltd, 2019.
[4] Nielsen, Michael A. "Neural networks and deep learning." Vol. 25. San Francisco, CA, USA: Determination press, 2015.
